item.title: The current mainstream CEX and DEX funding rate display indicates that the market is almost entirely bearish.
item.description: On August 20th, based on Coinglass data, the current mainstream CEX and DEX funding rates suggest that the market is almost entirely in a bearish trend.**BlockBeats Note**: The Funding Rate is a rate set by cryptocurrency exchanges to maintain the balance between the contract price and the underlying asset price. It is usually applicable to perpetual contracts and is a mechanism for the exchange of funds between long and short traders. The exchange does not collect this fee but uses it to adjust the cost or profit of traders holding contracts to keep the contract price close to the underlying asset price.When the Funding Rate is 0.01%, it represents the baseline rate. When the Funding Rate is above 0.01%, it indicates a generally bullish market. When the Funding Rate is below 0.005%, it indicates a generally bearish market.

item.title: Binance Wallet will launch AKEDO (AKE) Exclusive TGE Event
item.description: August 20th. As per official channels, Binance Wallet is set to launch the AKEDO (AKE) exclusive TGE event on August 21st, 2025, from 8:00 AM to 10:00 AM (UTC). Qualified users will be required to utilize Binance Alpha Points to take part.

item.title: Glassnode: Major Tokens Such as BTC, ETH, and SOL Hit All-Time Highs in Daily Profit
item.description: On August 20th, Glassnode shared data on social media suggesting a market contraction. This was mainly due to large-scale profit-taking by investors who had held their assets for more than 1 month (non-day traders), including the following:· On July 18th: Bitcoin holders with a holding period of over 1 month realized profits exceeding $1.5 billion, marking the largest single-day profit peak since December 2024.· On August 16th: Ethereum witnessed profits of $575 million, which was the largest profit-taking wave so far in this cycle, indicating that long-term holders were risk-averse.· On August 17th: SOL holders with a holding period of over 1 month realized profits exceeding $105 million, marking the largest single-day profit event since the early 2025 surge.

item.title: BAS Surges Over 120% in 24 Hours, Market Cap Exceeds $40 Million
item.description: On August 20th, based on market data, the Binance Alpha Zone token BAS has witnessed a 132% increase in price within the past 24 hours. Its market capitalization has exceeded $40 million, and the 24-hour trading volume is $46.43 million.

item.title: Radiant Capital Hackers Once Again Spend 10 Million DAI to Leverage ETH
item.description: On August 20th, as monitored by on-chain data analyst Yu Jin, the hacker of Radiant Capital continued to purchase 10 million DAI worth of ETH in the past hour. Today, this address has spent a total of 18.64 million DAI to buy 4487.8 ETH at an average price of $4154.

item.title: Binance: Users with a minimum of 200 points can claim a 200 SAPIEN airdrop.
item.description: On August 20th, Binance officials declared that following the commencement of trading for Sapien (SAPIEN), users possessing at least 200 Binance Alpha Points will be eligible to receive a 200 SAPIEN token airdrop on a first-come, first-served basis until the airdrop pool is completely distributed or the airdrop event concludes.It should be noted that claiming the airdrop will consume 15 Alpha Points. Users are required to confirm their receipt on the Alpha Events page within 24 hours; otherwise, it will be deemed that the user has waived the airdrop.

item.title: A whale address has unbonded 98,000 SOL and transferred all to Binance
item.description: On August 20th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, a whale address commencing with 91GShr un-staked 98,291 SOL (approximately $17.83 million) 30 minutes ago and subsequently transferred the entire amount to Binance.

item.title: Tom Lee: Powell's Friday Speech May Be Understood by the Market as "Dovish," While the Stock Market Will Rise After the Speech
item.description: On August 20th, Tom Lee, the newly appointed Chairman of the Board of BitMine, posted on social media, indicating that during discussions with institutional investors, a greater number of people anticipate that Federal Reserve Chairman Powell will incline towards a "hawkish" stance in his speech this Friday. This is because he does not wish to be cornered into the situation of cutting interest rates. However, this is merely the "baseline scenario," and the probability leans towards his statement being regarded as "dovish," which implies that the stock market may rise after the Jackson Hole event.Federal Reserve Chairman Powell is scheduled to deliver a speech on the economic outlook and the evaluation of the Federal Reserve's policy framework at the annual central bank symposium of the Federal Reserve Bank of Kansas City in Jackson Hole, Wyoming, at 10 a.m. Eastern Time (10 p.m. Beijing Time) on August 22nd.

item.title: ARK Invest's ARKK increased its position by 356,000 shares of Bullish (BLSH) yesterday, equivalent to approximately $21.2 million.
item.description: On August 20th, based on Tuesday's trading notifications, ARK Invest's leading ARK Innovation ETF (ARKK) bought 356,346 shares of Bullish stock, which was approximately worth $21.2 million. Additionally, it purchased 150,908 shares of Robinhood Markets stock yesterday, with a value of $16.2 million.Last week, ARK Invest made a substantial investment in Bullish. It acquired 2.53 million shares of the cryptocurrency exchange platform through three ETFs after the platform made its debut on the New York Stock Exchange, with a value of $172 million.

item.title: SEC Chair: Only a tiny number of tokens meet the definition of a security, ushering in a new era for the crypto industry
item.description: On August 20th, SEC Chairman Paul Atkins recently restated his favorable stance towards cryptocurrency. He emphasized that "a very small number" of tokens fall into the securities category. This statement represents a significant change from the regulatory attitude of the previous administration.While attending a blockchain symposium in Wyoming on Tuesday, Paul Atkins clearly stated: "The SEC will actively promote the new idea that tokens themselves may not necessarily and likely do not constitute securities. In my view, very few tokens truly meet the definition of securities, with the key depending on their ecosystem and method of sale."This statement comes as the latest policy signal from the SEC following the launch of "Project Crypto" last month. The project has been described by the chairman as a key part of securities law "modernization" reform, aiming to drive the U.S. financial markets towards on-chain transformation.Paul Atkins emphasized, "Especially for the crypto indu
